Articles.Content: List any bugs you find in the game (make sure to put version somewhere), and explain them.

One i found was while using an external mouse, sometimes the drag function (right click + drag) stops working. It usually happens if I use my touchpad on my laptop for a bit (while in the game). I have to click on like a browser or something to get the drag function working again. Please fix this it's annoying 

 

Also, please fix the zooming with the mouse.
I feel like there are places to discuss this better than on the General Discussion forum...
Or better yet, post them to the Bug Tracker.
